body_html:
@bignamehyp is not the same issue, the build works fine with cuda 8 and is not a vm as in the article pointed by you.

Also I use GPU version and https://github.com/mind/wheels/releases/download/tf1.4-gpu/tensorflow-1.4.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl

MKL is for running NN on CPU faster and the version installed on my machine is GPU.
I installed libraries, build from source and still same issue.

you closed the issue without pointing to a solution ...
